mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERCS (UCS_IDX , U_NO, UCS_TITLE, UCS_CONT, UW_DATE, UCS_IMG, UCS_CATEGORY) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(UCS_IDX), 0)+1 FROM USERCS), #{u_no}, #{ucs_title}, #{ucs_cont}, SYSDATE, #{ucs_img}, #{ucs_category} )

INSERT INTO STORECS (SCS_IDX , S_NO, SCS_TITLE, SCS_CONT, SW_DATE, SCS_IMG, SCS_CATEGORY) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(SCS_IDX), 0)+1 FROM STORECS), #{s_no}, #{scs_title}, #{scs_cont}, SYSDATE, #{scs_img}, #{scs_category} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USERCS WHERE U_NO = #{u_no} ORDER BY UCS_IDX DESC
SELECT CS.UCS_IDX, U.U_ID, CS.UCS_CATEGORY, CS.UCS_TITLE, CS.UW_DATE, CS.RES_DATE FROM USERCS CS LEFT JOIN TUSER U ON CS.U_NO = U.U_NO ORDER BY CS.UCS_IDX DESC
SELECT * FROM STORECS WHERE S_NO = #{s_no} ORDER BY SCS_IDX DESC
SELECT CS.SCS_IDX , S.S_ID, CS.SCS_CATEGORY, CS.SCS_TITLE, CS.SW_DATE, CS.RES_DATE FROM STORECS CS LEFT JOIN STORE S ON CS.S_NO = S.S_NO ORDER BY CS.SCS_IDX DESC
